original_text: Moses could have been very rich in Egypt. But instead, he let people insult him. He chose to receive trouble because of God's special Messiah. He thought that was worth more than if he had a lot of money. He thought carefully about what God would give him at a future time.
korean_text: 그리스도를 위하여 받는 수모를 애굽의 모든 보화보다 더 큰 재물로 여겼으니 이는 상 주심을 바라봄이라

sentences.original_text: Moses could have been very rich in Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 이집트에서 매우 부유할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: But instead, he let people insult him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 대신 그는 사람들이 자신을 모욕하게 내버려 두었습니다

sentences.original_text: He thought that was worth more
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것이 더 가치 있다고 생각했습니다

sentences.original_text: than if he had a lot of money
about what God would give him
